title: Coming back to play after 2-3 years...
body: What the heck did I miss?

replies.body: Lots, but my fav being the new Nunu :3. They nailed it with the VO and story. Welcome back! Hope you have fun!

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nJqft3IF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-08T01:11:55.945+0000)
>
> Lots, but my fav being the new Nunu :3. They nailed it with the VO and story. Welcome back! Hope you have fun!

Hey ! Quick question , do you think Rioters have forgotten about Taric ? Its almost 1000 days since he got his last skin and many other champion but after reading his comic him climbing Mount Targon he really inspired me and i wish that he will receive a skin that shows how powerful he is . Sorry to bother you ! I was really curious for a long time about this question ! Have a nice day !

> [{quoted}](name=Xzq,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nJqft3IF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-02-08T17:57:19.353+0000)
>
> Hey ! Quick question , do you think Rioters have forgotten about Taric ? Its almost 1000 days since he got his last skin and many other champion but after reading his comic him climbing Mount Targon he really inspired me and i wish that he will receive a skin that shows how powerful he is . Sorry to bother you ! I was really curious for a long time about this question ! Have a nice day !

I can assure you we've not forgotten about Taric (lets be real, hes pretty unforgettable). However Idk about skins production. I'm not entirely sure what strategy goes into choosing what skins to make where, but I can imagine it has something to do with how much we can make period. We are only human on this side of the computer, and that means theres a limit to how much we can work and make. But again, I'm not on those teams or in the know of exactly whats going down, so I can only speculate :3

Sorry you're frustrated that Taric hasn't gotten a new skin recently :(, I feel you.
You missed all the disasterous decisions that Riot made in turning this game into counterstrike go.  There's no defense there's just terrible terrible damage...and nautilus.

to summ it all up: after season 5 something happened to the balance team. they lost all their senses turning the game into a 1shot shitfest.
to add to this they started to only release overloaded champs usually with true damage or max hp% damage or some shit, while constantly fucking the game even harder.

also they keep showing us they dont know their own game anymore for example by giving us tower plates to "slow down snowballing" but as a matter of fact towers might survive 1-2 min more, but the insane amount of gold you get from plates makes snowballing even worse.

to "counter" that they nerfed jungle so junglers are always underleveld now. leading to only shit like rengar and other 1shot fuckers being viable.
aside from new champs, esports, lunar festival, new season of grinding and griping, Blitz, ARURF, and overall a downgrade of the game, nothing much.

> [{quoted}](name=Loa Erebonius,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nJqft3IF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-02-08T06:45:45.937+0000)
>
> What you certainly didn't miss is a new skin for Taliyah. 
> 
> {{sticker:sg-janna}}
>  ######just ignore the esports skin ok

They don't count anyway. I remember one champ got an esports skin and then got a regular skin right away and people lost their shit until Riot came out and said "Guys...esports skins don't count...we don't plan those until AFTER someone wins the cup!"

If it helps, I started a board for something like this:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/IrVl1IQK-new-players-and-parents-click-over-here-help-is-on-the-way

If you want to participate. It's more aimed at new players/parents, but you are welcome to join! That being said:

Dragons now give different buffs
Runes + masteries are combined and are now free, AND you can change them in champ select :)
Lux got 50 skins
Ryze had more reworks
More and more champions are "bending the rules" (Sylas ult-copy, Neeko disguises, Ornn with portable shop, etc)
Rito is popping off with reworks of old champions/skins
New tutorial system
In-game voice chat (can only do with premade members)
Ranked is now somewhat separated by the player's role (See dev corner posts)

Hope this helps {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
A lot of Tilt about Zoe.
Oh God.  That's being nice about it.
